飾.definition: decoration; ornament; to decorate; to adorn; to hide; to conceal (a fault); excuse (to hide a fault); to play a role (in opera); to impersonate

飾演.definition: to act; to play a part

飾胸鷸.definition: (bird species of China) buff-breasted sandpiper (Tryngites subruficollis)

飾釘.definition: stud (for decorating clothing, shoes, belts etc)
